data.communities: CGI::Application Mail List, Module Review List
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a subclass of Application::Pipeline which defines phases
    appropriate for web applications. It also includes a number of
    plugins that allow it to mimic CGI::Application. An example
    application demonstrating this is included. Rationale for this
    module was included in the registration for Application::Pipeline
